name: Schema Discriminator 1
title: Schema Discriminator 1: Melanoma Ciliary Body/Melanoma Iris
notes:
**Note:** A schema discriminator is used to discriminate between melanoma tumors with primary site code C694: Ciliary Body/Iris. Code the site in which the tumor arose. 
* **Melanoma Ciliary Body (see code 1)**
Subsites include: Ciliary body, crystalline lens, sclera, uveal tract, intraocular, eyeball
* **Melanoma Iris (see code 2)**
Subsite includes: Iris
rows:
Ciliary Body
Crystalline lens
Sclera
Uveal tract
Intraocular
Eyeball
67:2 Uvea: Choroidal and Ciliary Body Melanomas
Primary Site is NOT C694, Discriminator is not necessary
